demo_scenarios.name: General Sadness
demo_scenarios.description: Someone feeling down but not in crisis
demo_scenarios.text: I'm feeling really sad today. Nothing seems to be going right.

demo_scenarios.name: Self-Harm Crisis
demo_scenarios.text: I want to cut myself tonight. I can't take this pain anymore.

demo_scenarios.name: Suicidal Ideation
demo_scenarios.text: I don't want to live anymore. Everyone would be better off without me.

demo_scenarios.name: Violence Threat
demo_scenarios.text: I'm going to hurt someone who deserves it. They'll pay for what they did.

demo_scenarios.name: Abuse Situation
demo_scenarios.text: He hits me every day and I'm scared. I don't know what to do.

demo_scenarios.name: Overdose Situation
demo_scenarios.text: I took too many pills and I feel really sick. I think I need help.

demo_scenarios.name: Subtle Self-Harm
demo_scenarios.text: I've been scratching myself when I'm stressed. It helps me feel something.

demo_scenarios.name: Passive Suicidal Thoughts
demo_scenarios.text: Sometimes I wish I could just disappear. Life feels so heavy.

demo_scenarios.name: Emotional Abuse
demo_scenarios.text: My partner constantly puts me down and makes me feel worthless. I can't do anything right.

demo_scenarios.name: Drug Use Concern
demo_scenarios.text: I've been taking more pills than prescribed. I know it's not good but I need them to cope.

demo_scenarios.name: Work Stress
demo_scenarios.text: Work has been really stressful lately. I'm overwhelmed with deadlines and pressure.

demo_scenarios.name: Relationship Problems
demo_scenarios.text: My partner and I have been fighting a lot. I don't know if we can work this out.

self_harm.immediate: I can hear that you're in a lot of pain right now. You don't have to go through this alone. Your life has value, even when it doesn't feel that way.
self_harm.supportive: It takes courage to reach out when you're struggling. I'm glad you did. You're not alone in this.

suicide.immediate: I'm very concerned about you right now. Your life matters, and I want to help you stay safe. Please know that you don't have to face this alone.
suicide.supportive: Thank you for sharing this with me. It takes incredible strength to be so honest. I'm here with you.

violence.immediate: I'm concerned about your safety. Violence is never the answer, and there are better ways to handle this situation.
violence.supportive: It's okay to feel angry, but we need to find safe ways to express these feelings.

abuse.immediate: I'm so sorry this is happening to you. You don't deserve to be treated this way. Your safety is the most important thing right now.
abuse.supportive: It took courage to share this with me. You're not to blame for what happened. You deserve to be treated with respect.

overdose.immediate: I'm very concerned about your safety right now. If you've already taken something, please call emergency services immediately.
overdose.supportive: I'm glad you're reaching out. You don't have to face this alone. There are people who care about you.

self_harm.name: To Write Love on Her Arms
self_harm.description: Hope and help for depression, addiction, and self-injury
